H0.text: The 2013 G8 Summit was held at Lough Erne Resort in Northern Ireland. In which county is this. Antrim

H1.text: The 2013 G8 Summit was held at Lough Erne Resort in Northern Ireland. In which county is this. Armagh

H2.text: The 2013 G8 Summit was held at Lough Erne Resort in Northern Ireland. In which county is this. Down

H3.text: The 2013 G8 Summit was held at Lough Erne Resort in Northern Ireland. In which county is this. Fermanagh

A4.text: The 39th G8 summit was held at the Lough Erne Resort, a five-star hotel and golf resort on the shore of Lough Erne in County Fermanagh, Northern Ireland.
